sentences.sContent: Leptospirosis causes severe jaundice, kidney failure and bleeding in the lungs.
sentences.sContent_eng: Leptospirosis causes severe jaundice, kidney failure and bleeding in the lungs.
sentences.sCn: 钩端螺旋体导致严重的黄疸、肾衰竭和肺出血。

sentences.sContent: The "yellow" in the name is explained by the jaundice that affects some patients, causing yellow eyes and yellow skin.
sentences.sContent_eng: The "yellow" in the name is explained by the jaundice that affects some patients, causing yellow eyes and yellow skin.
sentences.sCn: 名称中的“黄”字由影响一些患者的黄疸使眼睛和皮肤颜色发黄而得到解释。

phrases.pCn: 梗阻性黄疸；阻塞性黄疸

words.tran: 使有偏见（jaundice的过去式）；使患黄疸病

trans.tranOther: a medical condition in which your skin and the white part of your eyes become yellow
